User sexes (USX_x)
[User Account Handling]

User sexes. More...

Defines

#define USX_MALE   'M' /**< User is male. */
 User is male.

#define USX_FEMALE   'F' /**< User is female. */
 User is female.

Detailed Description

User sexes.

These flags give a user's sex. We take the prude approach and only define the two biological sexes. Feel free to make any additions yourself nd send us a patch for the sheer heck of it.

  • USX_MALE. User is male.

  • USX_FEMALE. User is female.
